name: Stampler
description:
Your new job becomes stamping empty paper sheets and getting paid for it. Time is limited, but you can increase it by paying with your hard-earned coins. 

As you progress, more stamps and more colours come to make things harder for you :)

This game was made for Jame Gam #18

Controls (only mouse needed) :
  • Hold the left mouse button and move your mouse to drag items around
  • Click the right mouse button while dragging an item to use the item
Tips/Tutorial:
  • The paper sheet and paperclip on the top are always available for you to take
  • First stamp the coloured pad with your stamp to take some paint and then stamp the paper
  • The wider stamp is used to accept/decline "contracts" and the others are for stamping papers
  • Move the stamped contract to the right bottom arrow to accept/decline it
  • Right-click with a paperclip on a paper to pin it
  • Right-click a paper to add it to already clipped papers (click with left mouse button to flip over pages)
  • Right-click with papers on a contract to fulfill it and get coins
  • Right-click with a coin on the clock to add more time

Made with Godot and C#. 

Thanks to Kenney, I've used their sound effects.
